resources.string: Thanks for Doing the Survey! We will now send your data anonymously to the server.
We have now received your survey data, many thanks for participation.
All survey data is collected and sent anonymously, for more information about the survey please read the following page

The survey data will be used as part of a research into IT background and security awareness of people, which contribute to user's selection of more complex pattern for mobile authentication method called lock screen, and whether people's general perception of risk dominates when choosing the pattern.
 Research is done by Pakizat Masgutova as a final year project for BSc degree at the University of Bristol.
 All data is sent securely and anonymously to the server with no ability to trace data back to you or your device.
 All data will be held for a maximum of three months and will only be used by Pakizat Masgutova and researchers at the University of Bristol.
 For more information please feel free to email me at pm1122@my.bristol.ac.uk
